page.title: 17 Station Court.
page.content: Station Court is situated by the approach road to the old Woodford Halse station.It has been open for 5 years and was built for old age pensioners. There are 24 flats with 1 person in and and 6 with couples.There have been 2 bad fires there and both were caused by cookers in the flats.There are 2 lifts for people who have difficulty in walking and want to go upstairs.The people upstairs often entertain the ones downstairs and make them laugh.The Warden,Mrs.Kirk, has to go around all the flats seeing if anybody wants anything from the shops like chocolate, sweets,cigarettes etc.In each corridor there is a firedoor made with special glass which will trap the fire in one corridor and stop it spreading.It is part of Mrs Kirk's duties to make sure that the residents are healthy and if not she must call the medical services.
